subject: Refine implementation plan with better task ordering
body:
- Move database setup to start of Phase 2 (needed before wallet ops)
- Add Sentry and webhook Edge Function to infrastructure tasks
- Distribute testing across phases instead of all at end
- Add desktop-required markers for mobile Claude Code compatibility
- Clean up SESSION_NOTES.md to be more concise

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Refine implementation plan with better task ordering
